body_html:
Hi @ebrevdo, the check "layer_sizes is none != layers is None" is already in the code. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/14974/files#diff-fb6bbbf892e4a4722fe40b8abd0b60bfR1194.

I also noticed that compute_output_shape is now public. The PR is updated accordingly.
body_text:
Hi @ebrevdo, the check "layer_sizes is none != layers is None" is already in the code. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/14974/files#diff-fb6bbbf892e4a4722fe40b8abd0b60bfR1194.
I also noticed that compute_output_shape is now public. The PR is updated accordingly.
body:
Hi @ebrevdo, the check "layer_sizes is none != layers is None" is already in the code. See https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/14974/files#diff-fb6bbbf892e4a4722fe40b8abd0b60bfR1194.

I also noticed that `compute_output_shape` is now public. The PR is updated accordingly.
